title: Pillow Cover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted running stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Geometric star and leaf forms embroidered in red, white and buff silk on heavy blue ground. Motifs have saw-tooth edges, and contain smaller motifs reserved in blue linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pillow Cover, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted running stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-2.
